   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(ssl_session_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   27: -include("tls_handshake.hrl").
   28: -include("ssl_record.hrl").
   29: 
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   32: 
   33: %% Common test
   34: -export([all/0,
   35:          groups/0,
   36:          init_per_suite/1,
   37:          init_per_group/2,
   38:          init_per_testcase/2,
   39:          end_per_suite/1,
   40:          end_per_group/2,
   41:          end_per_testcase/2
   42:         ]).
   43: 
   44: %% Test cases
   45:  -export([reuse_session/0,
   46:          reuse_session/1,
   47:          reuse_session_expired/0,
   48:          reuse_session_expired/1,
   49:          server_does_not_want_to_reuse_session/0,
   50:          server_does_not_want_to_reuse_session/1,
   51:          explicit_session_reuse/0,
   52:          explicit_session_reuse/1,
   53:          explicit_session_reuse_expired/0,
   54:          explicit_session_reuse_expired/1,
   55:          no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert/0,
   56:          no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert/1,
   57:          no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert_file/0,
   58:          no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert_file/1,
   59:          client_max_session_table/0,
   60:          client_max_session_table/1, 
   61:          server_max_session_table/0,
   62:          server_max_session_table/1, 
   63:          session_table_stable_size_on_tcp_close/0,
   64:          session_table_stable_size_on_tcp_close/1
   65:         ]).
   66: 
   67: -define(SLEEP, 500).
   68: -define(EXPIRE, 2).
   69: -define(CLIENT_CB, ssl_client_session_cache_db).
   70: 
   71: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   72: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   73: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: all() -> 
   75:     [
   76:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   77:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   78:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   79:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   80:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   81:     ].
   82: 
   83: groups() ->
   84:     [{'dtlsv1.2', [], session_tests()},
   85:      {'dtlsv1', [], session_tests()},
   86:      {'tlsv1.3', [], session_tests() ++ tls_session_tests()},
   87:      {'tlsv1.2', [], session_tests() ++ tls_session_tests()},
   88:      {'tlsv1.1', [], session_tests() ++ tls_session_tests()},
   89:      {'tlsv1', [], session_tests() ++ tls_session_tests()}
   90:     ].
   91: 
   92: session_tests() ->
   93:     [reuse_session,
   94:      reuse_session_expired,
   95:      server_does_not_want_to_reuse_session,
   96:      explicit_session_reuse,
   97:      explicit_session_reuse_expired,
   98:      no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert,
   99:      no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert_file,
  100:      client_max_session_table,
  101:      server_max_session_table
  102:     ].
  103: 
  104: tls_session_tests() ->
  105:        [session_table_stable_size_on_tcp_close].
  106: 
  107: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  108:     catch application:stop(crypto),
  109:     try application:start(crypto) of
  110: 	ok ->
  111: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  112:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  113:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config)
  114:     catch _:_ ->
  115: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  116:     end.
  117: 
  118: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  119:     ssl:stop(),
  120:     application:stop(crypto).
  121: 
  122: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  123:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config). 
  124: 
  125: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  126:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  127: 
  128: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config)  when TestCase == reuse_session_expired;
  129:                                           TestCase == explicit_session_reuse_expired ->
  130:     Versions = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  131:     ssl:stop(),
  132:     application:load(ssl),    
  133:     ssl_test_lib:clean_env(),
  134:     ssl_test_lib:set_protocol_versions(Versions),
  135:     application:set_env(ssl, session_lifetime, ?EXPIRE),
  136:     ssl:start(),
  137:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  138:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  139:     Config;
  140: init_per_testcase(client_max_session_table, Config) ->
  141:     Versions = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  142:     ssl:stop(),
  143:     application:load(ssl),    
  144:     ssl_test_lib:clean_env(),
  145:     ssl_test_lib:set_protocol_versions(Versions),
  146:     application:set_env(ssl, session_cache_client_max, 2),
  147:     ssl:start(),
  148:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  149:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  150:     Config;
  151: init_per_testcase(server_max_session_table, Config) ->
  152:     Versions = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  153:     ssl:stop(),
  154:     application:load(ssl),    
  155:     ssl_test_lib:clean_env(),
  156:     ssl_test_lib:set_protocol_versions(Versions),
  157:     application:set_env(ssl, session_cache_server_max, 2),
  158:     ssl:start(),
  159:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  160:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  161:     Config;
  162: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  163:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  164:     Config.
  165: 
  166: end_per_testcase(reuse_session_expired, Config) ->
  167:     application:unset_env(ssl, session_lifetime),    
  168:     Config;
  169: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  170:     Config.
  171: 
  172: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  173: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  174: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  175: reuse_session() ->
  176:     [{doc,"Test reuse of sessions (short handshake)"}].
  177: reuse_session(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  178:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  179:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  180:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  181:     ssl_test_lib:reuse_session([{versions,[Version]} | ClientOpts], 
  182:                                [{versions,[Version]} | ServerOpts], Config).
  183: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  184: reuse_session_expired() ->
  185:     [{doc,"Test sessions is not reused when it has expired"}].
  186: reuse_session_expired(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  187:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  188:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  189:     TestVersion = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  190:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  191:     Ciphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, TestVersion),
  192:                                        [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa) -> false;
  193:                                                           (srp_dss) -> false;
  194:                                                           (_) -> true
  195:                                                        end}]),
  196: 
  197:     Server0 =
  198: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  199: 				   {from, self()},
  200: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  201: 				   {tcp_options, [{active, false}]},
  202: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  203:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  204:     
  205:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  206:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  207:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  208:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save},
  209:                                                                      {ciphers, Ciphers}| ClientOpts]}]),
  210:     Server0 ! listen,
  211:     
  212:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  213:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  214:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  215:                                          {from, self()},  {options,  [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ClientOpts]}]),
  216:     
  217:     SID = receive
  218:               {Client0, Id0} ->
  219:                   Id0
  220:           end,
  221:        
  222:     receive
  223:         {Client1, SID} ->
  224:             ok
  225:     after ?SLEEP ->
  226:               ct:fail(session_not_reused)
  227:     end,
  228:     
  229:     Server0 ! listen,
  230:     
  231:     %% Make sure session is unregistered due to expiration
  232:     ct:sleep({seconds, ?EXPIRE*2}),
  233: 
  234:     make_sure_expired(Hostname, Port0, SID),
  235:     
  236:     Client2 =
  237: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, 
  238: 				   {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  239: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  240: 				   {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts}]),   
  241:     receive
  242: 	{Client2, SID} ->
  243:             end_per_testcase(?FUNCTION_NAME, Config),
  244: 	    ct:fail(session_reused_when_session_expired);
  245: 	{Client2, _} ->
  246: 	    ok
  247:     end,
  248:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  249:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  250:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  251:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  252:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client2).
  253: 
  254: make_sure_expired(Host, Port, Id) ->
  255:     {status, _, _, StatusInfo} = sys:get_status(whereis(ssl_manager)),
  256:     [_, _,_, _, Prop] = StatusInfo,
  257:     State = ssl_test_lib:state(Prop),
  258:     ClientCache = element(2, State),
  259: 
  260:     case ssl_client_session_cache_db:lookup(ClientCache, {{Host,  Port}, Id}) of
  261: 	undefined ->
  262:    	   ok; 
  263: 	#session{is_resumable = false} ->
  264:    	   ok;
  265: 	_ ->
  266: 	    ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  267:             make_sure_expired(Host, Port, Id)
  268:     end.     
  269: 
  270: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  271: server_does_not_want_to_reuse_session() ->
  272:     [{doc,"Test reuse of sessions (short handshake)"}].
  273: server_does_not_want_to_reuse_session(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  274:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  275:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  276:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  277: 
  278:     Server = 
  279: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  280: 				   {from, self()},
  281: 		      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  282: 				   {options, [{reuse_session, fun(_,_,_,_) ->
  283: 								      false
  284: 							      end} | 
  285: 					      ServerOpts]}]),
  286:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  287:     Client0 =
  288: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, 
  289: 		      {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  290: 			    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  291: 		      {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),   
  292:     SessionInfo = 
  293: 	receive
  294: 	    {Server, Info} ->
  295: 		Info
  296: 	end,
  297:        
  298:     Server ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}}},
  299:     
  300:     %% Make sure session is registered
  301:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  302: 
  303:     Client1 =
  304: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, 
  305: 		      {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  306: 		      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  307: 		      {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),    
  308:     receive
  309: 	{Client1, SessionInfo} ->
  310: 	    ct:fail(session_reused_when_server_does_not_want_to);
  311: 	{Client1, _Other} ->
  312: 	   ok
  313:     end,
  314:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  315:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  316:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  317: 
  318: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  319: explicit_session_reuse() ->
  320:     [{doc,"Test {reuse_session, {ID, Data}}} option for explicit reuse of sessions not"
  321:      " saved in the clients automated session reuse"}].
  322: explicit_session_reuse(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  323:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  324:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  325:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  326: 
  327:     Server =
  328: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  329:                                    {from, self()},
  330:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  331:                                    {options, ServerOpts}]),
  332:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  333:     {Client0, Client0Sock} =
  334: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  335:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  336:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  337:                                    {from, self()}, {options, [{reuse_sessions, false} | ClientOpts]},
  338:                                    return_socket
  339:                                   ]),
  340: 
  341:     {ok, [{session_id, ID}, {session_data, SessData}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client0Sock, [session_id, session_data]),
  342: 
  343:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  344: 
  345:     Server ! listen,
  346: 
  347:     {_, Client1Sock} =
  348: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  349:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  350:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  351:                                    {from, self()}, {options, [{reuse_session, {ID, SessData}} | ClientOpts]},
  352:                                    return_socket]),
  353: 
  354:     {ok, [{session_id, ID}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client1Sock, [session_id]).
  355: 
  356: 
  357: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  358: 
  359: explicit_session_reuse_expired() ->
  360:     [{doc,"Test to reuse a session that has expired and make sure server session table is correctly handled"}].
  361: explicit_session_reuse_expired(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  362:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  363:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  364:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  365: 
  366:     Server =
  367: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  368:                                    {from, self()},
  369:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  370:                                    {options, ServerOpts}]),
  371:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  372:     {Client0, Client0Sock} =
  373: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  374:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  375:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  376:                                    {from, self()}, {options, [{reuse_sessions, false} | ClientOpts]},
  377:                                    return_socket
  378:                                   ]),
  379:     %% Retrieve session data
  380:     {ok, [{session_id, ID0}, {session_data, SessData}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client0Sock, [session_id, session_data]),
  381: 
  382:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  383: 
  384:     Server ! listen,
  385: 
  386:     SupName = sup_name(ServerOpts),
  387:     Sup = whereis(SupName),
  388:     %% Will only be one process, that is one server, in our test scenario
  389:     [{_, SessionCachePid, worker,[ssl_server_session_cache]}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup),
  390: 
  391:     %% Start a new connections so there are three sessions
  392:     {Client1, Client1Sock}  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  393:                                           {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  394:                                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  395:                                           {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts]},
  396:                                                          return_socket]),
  397: 
  398:     Server ! listen,
  399: 
  400:     {Client2, Client2Sock}  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  401:                                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  402:                                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  403:                                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts]},
  404:                                                          return_socket]),
  405: 
  406:     {ok, [{session_id, ID1}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client1Sock, [session_id]),
  407: 
  408:     %% Assert three sessions in server table
  409:     {SessionCacheCb, SessionCacheDb} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  410:     3 = SessionCacheCb:size(SessionCacheDb),
  411: 
  412:     Server ! listen,
  413: 
  414:     {ok, [{session_id, ID2}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client2Sock, [session_id]),
  415: 
  416:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  417:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client2),
  418: 
  419:     %% Make sure session expired
  420:     ct:sleep({seconds, ?EXPIRE*2}),
  421: 
  422:     %% Try to reuse session one after expiration
  423:     {_, Client3Sock} =
  424: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  425:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  426:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  427:                                    {from, self()}, {options, [{reuse_session, {ID0, SessData}} | ClientOpts]},
  428:                                    return_socket]),
  429: 
  430:     %% Verify that we got a new session
  431:     {ok, [{session_id, ID3}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client3Sock, [session_id]),
  432: 
  433:     %% We tried reusing ID0. So ID1 and ID2 should not be possible but assert anyway
  434:     true = (ID3=/= ID0) andalso (ID3 =/= ID1) andalso (ID3 =/= ID2),
  435: 
  436:     %% Server table should have removed the expired session that we tried to reuse.
  437:     %% and replaced the second one that expired. Leaving the third and the new
  438:     {SessionCacheCb1, SessionCacheDb1} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  439:     2 = SessionCacheCb1:size(SessionCacheDb1),
  440: 
  441: 
  442:     Server ! listen,
  443: 
  444:     %% Make sure session expired
  445:     ct:sleep({seconds, ?EXPIRE*2}),
  446: 
  447: 
  448:     %% Nothing is removed yet
  449:     {SessionCacheCb2, SessionCacheDb2} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  450:     2 = SessionCacheCb2:size(SessionCacheDb2),
  451: 
  452: 
  453:     {_, Client4Sock} =
  454: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  455:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  456:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  457:                                    {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts},
  458:                                    return_socket]),
  459: 
  460:     %% Expired session is not reused
  461:     {ok, [{session_id, ID4}]} = ssl:connection_information(Client4Sock, [session_id]),
  462:     true = (ID4 =/= ID3),
  463: 
  464:     %% One expired session is replaced
  465:     {SessionCacheCb3, SessionCacheDb3} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  466:     2 = SessionCacheCb3:size(SessionCacheDb3).
  467: 
  468: 
  469: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  470: no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert() ->
  471:     [{doc,"Check that a session is not reused if the server is restarted with a new cert."}].
  472: no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  473:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_der_opts, Config),
  474:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_verify_opts, Config),
  475:     POpts = proplists:get_value(protocol_opts, Config, []),
  476: 
  477:     #{client_config := NewCOpts,
  478:       server_config := NewSOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(rsa,
  479:                                                                      [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  480:                                                                       [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}],
  481:                                                                       [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]]),
  482: 
  483:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  484: 
  485:     Server0 =
  486: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  487: 				   {from, self()},
  488:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  489: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  490:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  491:     Client0 =
  492: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  493:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  494:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  495:                                    {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts]}]),
  496:     Info0 = receive {Server0, Info00} -> Info00 end,
  497:     Info0 = receive {Client0, Info01} -> Info01 end,
  498: 
  499:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  500:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  501:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  502: 
  503:     Server1 = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  504:                                          {from, self()},
  505:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  506:                                          {options, [{reuseaddr, true} | NewSOpts ++ POpts]}]),
  507: 
  508:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  509:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  510:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  511:                                          {from, self()},  {options, NewCOpts ++ POpts}]),
  512:     Info1 = receive {Server1, Info10} -> Info10 end,
  513: 
  514:     receive
  515: 	{Client1, Info0} ->
  516: 	    ct:fail(session_reused_when_server_has_new_cert);
  517: 	{Client1, Info1} ->
  518:             ?CT_LOG("First: ~p~nSecond ~p~n",[Info0, Info1]);
  519:         Unexpected ->
  520:             ct:fail({unexpected, Unexpected, {Client1, Info1}})
  521:     end,
  522:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server1),
  523:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  524: 
  525: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  526: no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert_file() ->
  527:     [{doc,"Check that a session is not reused if a server is restarted with a new "
  528:       "cert contained in a file with the same name as the old cert."}].
  529: 
  530: no_reuses_session_server_restart_new_cert_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  531:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  532:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  533:     POpts = proplists:get_value(protocol_opts, Config, []),
  534: 
  535:     #{client_config := NewCOpts,
  536:       server_config := NewSOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_pem(rsa,
  537:                                                                      [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  538:                                                                       [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}],
  539:                                                                       [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]],
  540:                                                                      Config, "ssl_session_new_rsa"),
  541:     PrivDir =  proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  542: 
  543:     NewServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:new_config(PrivDir, ServerOpts),
  544:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  545: 
  546:     Server =
  547: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  548: 				   {from, self()},
  549:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  550: 				   {options, NewServerOpts0}]),
  551:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  552:     Client0 =
  553: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  554:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  555:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  556:                                    {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
  557:     SessionInfo =
  558: 	receive
  559: 	    {Server, Info} ->
  560: 		Info
  561: 	end,
  562: 
  563:     %% Make sure session is registered and we get
  564:     %% new file time stamp when calling new_config!
  565:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP* 2),
  566:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  567:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  568: 
  569:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  570: 
  571:     NewServerOpts1 = ssl_test_lib:new_config(PrivDir, NewSOpts),
  572: 
  573:     Server1 =
  574: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  575: 				   {from, self()},
  576:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  577: 				   {options,  [{reuseaddr, true} | NewServerOpts1 ++ POpts]}]),
  578:     Client1 =
  579: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  580:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  581:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  582: 				   {from, self()},  {options, NewCOpts ++ POpts}]),
  583:     receive
  584: 	{Client1, SessionInfo} ->
  585: 	    ct:fail(session_reused_when_server_has_new_cert);
  586: 	{Client1, _Other} ->
  587: 	   ok
  588:     end,
  589:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server1),
  590:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  591: 
  592: 
  593: client_max_session_table() ->
  594:       [{doc, "Check that max session table limit is not exceeded, set max to 2 in init_per_testcase"}].
  595: 
  596: client_max_session_table(Config) when is_list(Config)->
  597:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  598:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  599:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  600:     test_max_session_limit(ClientOpts,ServerOpts,ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName),    
  601:     %% Explicit check table size
  602:     {status, _, _, StatusInfo} = sys:get_status(whereis(ssl_manager)),
  603:     [_, _,_, _, Prop] = StatusInfo,
  604:     State = ssl_test_lib:state(Prop),
  605:     ClientCache = element(2, State),	
  606:     2 = ?CLIENT_CB:size(ClientCache).
  607:     
  608: server_max_session_table() ->
  609:       [{doc, "Check that max session table limit exceeded, set max to 2 in init_per_testcase"}].
  610: 
  611: server_max_session_table(Config) when is_list(Config)->
  612:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  613:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  614:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  615:     test_max_session_limit(ClientOpts,ServerOpts,ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName),
  616:     %% Explicit check table size
  617:     SupName = sup_name(ServerOpts),
  618:     Sup = whereis(SupName),
  619:     %% Will only be one process, that is one server, in our test scenario
  620:     [{_, SessionCachePid, worker,[ssl_server_session_cache]}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup),
  621:     {SessionCacheCb, SessionCacheDb} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  622:     N = SessionCacheCb:size(SessionCacheDb),
  623:     true = N == 2.
  624: 
  625: session_table_stable_size_on_tcp_close() ->
  626:       [{doc, "Check that new sessions are cleanup when connection is closed abruptly during first handshake"}].
  627: 
  628: session_table_stable_size_on_tcp_close(Config) when is_list(Config)->
  629:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  630:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  631: 
  632:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  633:                                         {from, self()},
  634:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  635:                                         {options,  [{reuseaddr, true} | ServerOpts]}]),
  636:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  637: 
  638:     Sup = whereis(ssl_server_session_cache_sup),
  639: 
  640:     %% Will only be one process, that is one server, in our test scenario
  641:     [{_, SessionCachePid, worker,[ssl_server_session_cache]}] = supervisor:which_children(Sup),
  642: 
  643: 
  644:     {SessionCacheCb, SessionCacheDb} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  645: 
  646:     N = SessionCacheCb:size(SessionCacheDb),
  647: 
  648:     faulty_client(Hostname, Port),
  649:     check_table_did_not_grow(SessionCachePid, N).
  650: 
  651: 
  652: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  653: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  654: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  655: session_cachce_info(SessionCache) ->
  656:     State = sys:get_state(SessionCache),
  657:     ServerCacheDb = element(4, State),
  658:     ServerCacheCb = element(2, State),
  659:     {ServerCacheCb, ServerCacheDb}.
  660: 
  661: 
  662: check_table_did_not_grow(SessionCachePid, N) ->
  663:     {SessionCacheCb, SessionCacheDb} = session_cachce_info(SessionCachePid),
  664:     ?CT_LOG("Run ~p ~p", [SessionCacheCb, SessionCacheDb]),
  665:     case catch SessionCacheCb:size(SessionCacheDb) of
  666:         N ->
  667:             ok;
  668:         Size ->
  669:             ct:fail({table_grew, [{expected, N}, {got, Size}]})
  670:     end.
  671: 
  672: faulty_client(Host, Port) ->
  673:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect(Host, Port, [], 10000),
  674:     Random = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(32),
  675:     CH = client_hello(Random),
  676:     CHBin = encode_client_hello(CH, Random),
  677:     gen_tcp:send(Sock, CHBin),
  678:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
  679:     gen_tcp:close(Sock).
  680: 
  681: 
  682: encode_client_hello(CH, Random) ->
  683:     HSBin = tls_handshake:encode_handshake(CH, ?TLS_1_2),
  684:     CS = connection_states(Random),
  685:     {Encoded, _} = tls_record:encode_handshake(HSBin, ?TLS_1_2, CS),
  686:     Encoded.
  687: 
  688: client_hello(Random) ->
  689:     CipherSuites = [<<0,255>>, <<"À,">>, <<"À0">>, <<"À$">>, <<"À(">>,
  690: 		    <<"À.">>, <<"À2">>, <<"À&">>, <<"À*">>, <<0,159>>,
  691: 		    <<0,163>>, <<0,107>>, <<0,106>>, <<"À+">>, <<"À/">>,
  692: 		    <<"À#">>, <<"À'">>, <<"À-">>, <<"À1">>, <<"À%">>,
  693: 		    <<"À)">>, <<0,158>>, <<0,162>>, <<0,103>>, <<0,64>>,
  694: 		    <<"À\n">>, <<192,20>>, <<0,57>>, <<0,56>>, <<192,5>>,
  695: 		    <<192,15>>, <<"À\t">>, <<192,19>>, <<0,51>>, <<0,50>>,
  696: 		    <<192,4>>, <<192,14>>],
  697:     Extensions = #{alpn => undefined,
  698: 		   ec_point_formats =>
  699: 		       {ec_point_formats,
  700: 			[0]},
  701: 		   elliptic_curves =>
  702: 		       {elliptic_curves,
  703: 			[{1,3,132,0,39},
  704: 			 {1,3,132,0,38},
  705: 			 {1,3,132,0,35},
  706: 			 {1,3,36,3,3,2,
  707: 			  8,1,1,13},
  708: 			 {1,3,132,0,36},
  709: 			 {1,3,132,0,37},
  710: 			 {1,3,36,3,3,2,
  711: 			  8,1,1,11},
  712: 			 {1,3,132,0,34},
  713: 			 {1,3,132,0,16},
  714: 			 {1,3,132,0,17},
  715: 			 {1,3,36,3,3,2,
  716: 			  8,1,1,7},
  717: 			 {1,3,132,0,10},
  718: 			 {1,2,840,
  719: 			  10045,3,1,7},
  720: 			 {1,3,132,0,3},
  721: 			 {1,3,132,0,26},
  722: 			 {1,3,132,0,27},
  723: 			 {1,3,132,0,32},
  724: 			 {1,3,132,0,33},
  725: 			 {1,3,132,0,24},
  726: 			 {1,3,132,0,25},
  727: 			 {1,3,132,0,31},
  728: 			 {1,2,840,
  729: 			  10045,3,1,1},
  730: 			 {1,3,132,0,1},
  731: 			 {1,3,132,0,2},
  732: 			 {1,3,132,0,15},
  733: 			 {1,3,132,0,9},
  734: 			 {1,3,132,0,8},
  735: 			 {1,3,132,0,
  736: 			  30}]},
  737: 		   next_protocol_negotiation =>
  738: 		       undefined,
  739: 		   renegotiation_info =>
  740: 		       {renegotiation_info,
  741: 			undefined},
  742: 		   signature_algs =>
  743: 		       {hash_sign_algos,
  744: 			[{sha512,ecdsa},
  745: 			 {sha512,rsa},
  746: 			 {sha384,ecdsa},
  747: 			 {sha384,rsa},
  748: 			 {sha256,ecdsa},
  749: 			 {sha256,rsa},
  750: 			 {sha224,ecdsa},
  751: 			 {sha224,rsa},
  752: 			 {sha,ecdsa},
  753: 			 {sha,rsa},
  754: 			 {sha,dsa}]},
  755: 		   sni =>
  756: 		       {sni,
  757: 			"localhost"},
  758: 		   srp =>
  759: 		       undefined},
  760: 
  761:     #client_hello{client_version = ?TLS_1_2,
  762: 		  random = Random,
  763: 		  session_id = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(32),
  764: 		  cipher_suites = CipherSuites,
  765: 		  extensions = Extensions
  766: 		 }.
  767: 
  768: connection_states(Random) ->
  769:     #{current_write =>
  770:           #{beast_mitigation => one_n_minus_one,
  771:             cipher_state => undefined,
  772:             mac_secret => undefined,
  773:             reneg => #{secure_renegotiation => undefined,
  774:                        client_verify_data => undefined,
  775:                        server_verify_data => undefined
  776:                       },
  777:             security_parameters =>
  778:                 #security_parameters{
  779:                   cipher_suite = <<0,0>>,
  780:                    connection_end = 1,
  781:                    bulk_cipher_algorithm = 0,
  782:                    cipher_type = 0,
  783:                    iv_size = 0,
  784:                    key_material_length = 0,
  785:                    mac_algorithm = 0,
  786:                    prf_algorithm = 0,
  787:                    hash_size = 0,
  788:                    master_secret = undefined,
  789:                    resumption_master_secret = undefined,
  790:                    client_random = Random,
  791:                    server_random = undefined},
  792:             sequence_number => 0,
  793:             max_fragment_length => undefined}}.
  794: 
  795: 
  796: 
  797: test_max_session_limit(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName) ->
  798:      Server0 =
  799: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  800: 				   {from, self()},
  801: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  802: 				   {tcp_options, [{active, false}]},
  803: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  804:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  805:     
  806:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  807:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, HostName},
  808:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  809:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts]}]),
  810:     SID0 = receive
  811:           {Client0, Id0} ->
  812:                   Id0
  813:           end,
  814:        
  815:    
  816:     Server0 ! listen,
  817:     
  818:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  819:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, HostName},
  820:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  821:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts]}]),    
  822:        
  823:     SID1 = receive
  824:                {Client1, Id1} ->
  825:                    Id1 
  826:            end,
  827:        
  828:     false = SID0 == SID1,
  829:     
  830:     
  831:     Server0 ! listen,
  832:     
  833:     Client2 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  834:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, HostName},
  835:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  836:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_sessions, save}| ClientOpts]}]),  
  837: 
  838:     
  839:     SID2 = receive
  840:                {Client2, Id2} ->
  841:                    Id2 
  842:            end,
  843: 
  844:     Server0 ! listen,
  845:     
  846:     Client3 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  847:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, HostName},
  848:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_id, []}},
  849:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{reuse_session, SID2}| ClientOpts]}]),   
  850:     
  851:     receive
  852:         {Client3, SID2} ->
  853:             ok;
  854:         Other  ->
  855:             ct:fail({{expected, SID2}, {got,Other}})
  856:     end.
  857: 
  858: 
  859: sup_name(Opts) ->
  860:    case proplists:get_value(protocol, Opts, tls) of
  861:        tls ->
  862:            ssl_server_session_cache_sup;
  863:        dtls ->
  864:            dtls_server_session_cache_sup
  865:    end.
  866:
